item.title: 希腊梅特伦公司近期积极推进欧洲防务合作
item.description: 希腊能源和金属公司 Metlen 在过去两周分别与法国和意大利达成交易后，正在寻求与欧洲国防承包商建立更多联盟。【原文：Greek energy and metals company Metlen is pursuing more alliances with European defense contractors after sealing French and Italian deals in the past two weeks.】

item.title: 华沙交易所在经纪商遭遇交易停顿后重新审查算法规则
item.description: 华沙证券交易所正在审查算法交易的相关规定，此前，由于全球资产价格大幅波动，机器人订单引发了交易暂停，导致证券交易所步履维艰。【原文：The Warsaw bourse is reviewing regulations for algorithmic trading after orders from bots triggered a halt in transactions that left the stock exchange hobbled as global asset prices gyrated.】

item.title: 奇货可居：罗布-卡普兰谈美联储对关税的看法（播客）
item.description: 周三，特朗普将 4 月 2 日宣布的大部分互惠关税从边缘拉了回来。市场大涨。但我们仍处于一个极具挑战性的时刻。我们有新的全面关税。我们对中国征收巨额关税。经济衰退有可能已经开始。那么，在这种环境下，在如此多的不确定性持续存在的情况下，美联储该怎么办？在本期节目中，我们采访了达拉斯联储前主席、现任副主席罗布-卡普兰（Rob Kaplan）。【原文：On Wednesday, Trump pulled back from the brink on most of the reciprocal tariffs announced on April 2. The market surged. But we’re still in an extraordinarily challenging moment. We have new across-the-board tariffs. We have gigantic tariffs on China. And there’s a possibility that a recession has already begun. So what does the Fed do in this environment, with so much persistent uncertainty? On this episode, we speak with Rob Kaplan, former President of the Dallas Fed, and now the Vice Chairma】

item.title: 散户投资者的乐观主义在怪物反弹中得到回报
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统改变贸易政策后，美国股市在周三上演了一场打破图表的反弹，其中有一群投资者取得了特别甜蜜的胜利。【原文：As US stocks staged a chart-busting rally on Wednesday after President Donald Trump’s about-face in his trade policy, one group of investors had an especially sweet victory.】

item.title: 欧盟数字主管称集团的技术规则并非贸易壁垒
item.description: 欧盟数字事务主管亨娜-维尔库宁（Henna Virkkunen）表示，欧盟管理 X 和 Meta Platforms Inc. 等数字平台的规则不应被视为对美贸易壁垒。【原文：European Union digital chief Henna Virkkunen said the bloc’s rules governing digital platforms like X and Meta Platforms Inc. should not be considered barriers to trade with the US.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团仍在商谈火灾后向皮博迪出售煤炭资产事宜
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）称，该公司仍在与皮博迪能源公司（Peabody Energy Corp.【原文：Anglo American Plc said it’s still in talks with Peabody Energy Corp. to sell its coal portfolio for $3.78 billion, adding that a fire at its Australian operations hadn’t caused damage.】

item.title: Oaktree 的霍华德-马克斯（Howard Marks）说，特朗普的关税让他想起了英国脱欧
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）联合创始人霍华德-马克斯（Howard Marks）认为，唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策有可能成为我们有生之年最大的经济事件。【原文：Donald Trump’s tariff policies have the potential to be the biggest economic event of our lifetimes, according to Oaktree Capital Management Co-Founder Howard Marks, who warned that reversing them could still have consequences.】

item.title: 菲律宾在通胀放缓和美国关税影响下下调关键利率
item.description: 菲律宾央行周四重启宽松货币政策，在市场受到美国不断变化的全球关税计划冲击之际，采取行动支持信心和经济增长。【原文：The Philippine central bank resumed its monetary policy easing on Thursday, moving to support confidence and growth as markets are whipsawed by changing US plans to impose global tariffs.】

item.title: 陶氏称美非贸易协定前景黯淡但谈判将于七月举行
item.description: 南非贸易部长帕克斯-陶（Parks Tau）表示，非洲国家和美国将于 6 月或 7 月就一项贸易协定举行会谈，该协定将向世界最大经济体提供免税准入。【原文：African nations and the US will hold talks in June or July on a trade pact that provides duty-free access to the world’s largest economy, South African Trade Minister Parks Tau said, adding it will be hard to salvage the arrangement that tariffs superseded last week.】

item.title: 丹斯克商品公司 2024 年利润因市场波动缓解而下降
item.description: 丹斯克商品公司（Danske Commodities A/S）称，由于能源市场波动缓解，去年利润骤降近 50%。【原文：Danske Commodities A/S said profit plunged by almost 50% last year as energy-market volatility eased.】

item.title: 中国宣布发现对芯片至关重要的石英，可与美国矿山媲美
item.description: 中国宣布发现了新的高纯度石英矿藏，这种矿物在半导体和太阳能电池板的生产中作用虽小，但至关重要。【原文：China announced it has discovered new deposits of high-purity quartz, a mineral with a small but crucial role in the production of semiconductors and solar panels.】

item.title: 埃及通胀加快，但仍有降息空间
item.description: 埃及的通胀率在前一个月几乎减半之后，在 3 月份有所加快，但可能仍然低得足以促使当局考虑自 2020 年以来的首次降息。【原文：Egyptian inflation quickened in March after almost halving the month before, but will probably still be low enough to prompt authorities to consider their first interest-rate cut since 2020.】

item.title: 美国暂停加征关税缓解需求担忧，欧洲天然气市场大涨
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普暂停对数十个贸易伙伴（包括中国）征收更高互惠关税的计划后，欧洲天然气价格出现反弹，缓解了人们对经济受到冲击可能拖累能源需求的担忧。【原文：European natural gas prices rebounded after US President Donald Trump paused plans to implement higher reciprocal tariffs on dozens of trade partners bar China, easing concerns about an economic hit that could weigh on demand for energy.】

item.title: 挪威核心通胀率保持稳定，令挪威央行松了一口气
item.description: 挪威上个月的基本通胀率一如预期保持不变，这很可能会抑制人们对挪威央行进一步推迟宽松计划的担忧。【原文：Norway’s underlying inflation maintained its pace last month as expected, likely damping fears over a further delay to easing plans by the nation’s central bank.】

item.title: 贝森特在与日本贸易谈判前撇清日元走强的影响
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他并不担心日元最近对美元的升值，这表明日本当局过去为加强日元而采取的干预措施不会妨碍两国即将举行的贸易谈判。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent suggested he’s not concerned about the yen’s recent appreciation against the dollar, a sign that past interventions to strengthen the yen by Japan’s authorities won’t impede forthcoming trade talks between the two nations.】

item.title: 关税暴击后美国原油流入中国涓滴至近乎零
item.description: 随着世界上最大的石油生产国和最大的石油进口国之间的贸易战不断升级，两国之间的石油流量将几乎为零。【原文：The flow of oil from the world’s biggest producer to its largest importer is set to thin to virtually zero as a trade war between the two powerhouse economies escalates.】

item.title: 乐购预期利润因税收增加和购物者减少而下降
item.description: Tesco Plc 预计今年的利润将下滑，因为这家连锁超市面临着更高的英国税率，以及对注重价格的购物者日益激烈的竞争。【原文：Tesco Plc expects profit to slip this year, as the supermarket chain faces higher UK taxes and growing competition for price-conscious shoppers.】

item.title: 即使特朗普暂停加征关税，美国关税仍处于历史高位
item.description: 经济学家表示，虽然金融市场对唐纳德-特朗普总统暂停对数十个贸易伙伴征收更高的关税表示欢迎，但美国的进口税仍处于历史高位，美国经济衰退的风险依然存在。【原文：While financial markets are welcoming President Donald Trump’s pause on higher tariffs for dozens of trade partners, American imports taxes are still at an historic high and a US recession is still a risk, economists say.】

item.description: 石油价格暴跌必将对沙特阿拉伯的财政和庞大的经济雄心产生深远影响。【原文：The oil-price crash is set to have far-reaching consequences for Saudi Arabia’s finances and vast economic ambitions.】

item.title: 特朗普以关税为支点孤立中国，为与习近平摊牌埋下伏笔
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统在关税威胁问题上的戏剧性转折使中国成为其贸易攻势的主要目标，这大大缩小了中国政府立即缓和局势的选择范围。【原文：President Donald Trump’s dramatic U-turn on tariff threats has isolated China as the primary target of his trade offensive, significantly narrowing Beijing’s options for immediate deescalation.】

item.title: 台湾力争将美国液化天然气进口份额增加两倍以规避关税
item.description: 台湾正计划在未来十年内大量购买美国液化天然气，这将使美国液化天然气在台湾的比例增加两倍。【原文：Taiwan is planning a surge in US purchases over the next decade that would triple the share of American liquefied natural gas in the island’s mix.】

item.title: 国有矿业公司面临资产被查封，津巴布韦债务困境加剧
item.description: 津巴布韦一家国有矿业公司正试图保护可能被没收的资产，因为该国未能偿还因镍和铂合资企业被取消而在国际仲裁案中败诉所产生的债务。【原文：A state-owned Zimbabwean mining firm is trying to protect assets that risk being seized because the country failed to honor a debt incurred when it lost an international arbitration case over canceled nickel and platinum ventures.】

item.title: 中国电池制造商面临关税之痛，国内困境雪上加霜
item.description: 中国的储能产业面临着美国惩罚性关税和政府缩减对国内市场支持的双重打击，销售前景堪忧。【原文：China’s energy storage industry faces a double whammy to its sales prospects from punitive US tariffs and scaled-back support from the government in its domestic market.】

item.title: 印度初创公司推出无需高级芯片即可运行人工智能的系统
item.description: 印度的一家人工智能初创公司 Ziroh Labs 与该国一流技术学校的研究人员合作，设计出了一种经济实惠的系统，并称该系统可以运行大型人工智能模型，而不需要像 Nvidia 公司这样的先进计算芯片。【原文：Ziroh Labs, an artificial intelligence startup operating in India, collaborated with researchers at the country’s premier technology school to design an affordable system that it says can run large AI models without requiring advanced computing chips from the likes of Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 据说吉宝将探索出售新加坡垃圾处理公司 800 Super
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，吉宝有限公司正在考虑出售其持有的八百超控股有限公司（800 Super Holdings Ltd.）的股份，该交易对这家废物管理公司的估值可能高达 6 亿新元（约合 4.48 亿美元）。【原文：Keppel Ltd. is considering selling its stake in 800 Super Holdings Ltd. in a transaction that could value the waste management firm at as much as S$600 million ($448 million), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 花旗财富主管西格称不要在股市剧烈波动时买跌停股
item.description: 花旗集团全球财富主管安迪-西格（Andy Sieg）表示，尽管 "高峰震荡 "可能已经过去，但花旗集团仍敦促富裕客户在市场剧烈波动时保持谨慎。【原文：Citigroup Inc. is urging rich clients to stay cautious amid extreme market volatility even though “peak shock” might have passed, according to the bank’s global wealth head Andy Sieg.】
